choicesHtml: symbolize the powerful forces of the modern globalized economy
pay homage to Pacific Island traditions by referencing a symbol of indigenous culture
evoke the memory of an infamous historic event that had lasting impact
draw attention to the environmental impact of cattle farming in the Pacific Islands
